name: Last Action Hero [SG]
description:
Last Action Hero is an action-arcade game developed by Psygnosis, Bits Studios, Teeny Weeny Games and The Dome Software Developments. It was originally released in 1993. Psygnosis published the game.
You can play Last Action Hero on Commodore / Amiga, SNES, NES and Game Boy.
It was scored by Marshall Parker, Mike Clarke and Shahid Ahmad.
